metadata.title: CVE-2017-7617 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Remote code execution can occur in Asterisk Open Source 13.x before 13.14.1and 14.x before 14.3.1 and Certified Asterisk 13.13 before 13.13-cert3because of a buffer overflow in a CDR user field, related to X-ClientCodein chan_sip, the CDR dialplan function, and the AMI Monitor action.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
